channel.title: Economics on Future Economists
channel.description: Recent content in Economics on Future Economists

item.title: Why Clean Energy Makes Sense, Economically
item.description: In 2024, 528 gigawatts of renewable energy were added globally, preventing $57 billion in fossil fuel usage while driving economic growth and job creation.

item.title: Tokenomics: Explained
item.description: Why so some cryptocurrencies hold long-term while others fade away? A close look at the tokenomics of the project can explain how supply, demand, and incentives shape these outcomes.

item.title: Discover Our Mission
item.description: Future Economists is a student-created journal dedicated to researching how and why emerging technologies will reshape the global economic landscape.
